author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Correct thickness of absorbers in the EE compartment of 2018 October test beam setups for high granularity calorimeter tests at CERN

#### PR validation:

Tested using cfg files in SimG4CMS/HGCalTestBeam/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-TB50 Update geometry of the EE section (Shilpi)
